CustomHeaderConstants CustomHeaderConstants Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Common.WebApi
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Uwp.dll
Edit

In this Article

public static class CustomHeaderConstants : objectPublic Module CustomHeaderConstants
    Inherits Object
Inheritance
ObjectObject
CustomHeaderConstantsCustomHeaderConstants

Fields

Ack Ack

Edit

[Optional] Used to specify the feedback required for the consumption of the message by the device. Possible values: “none”: no feedback “positive”: receive a feedback message if the message was consumed “negative”: receive a feedback message if the message expired without being completed by the device “full”: both positive and negative

public const string Ack = nullPublic Const Ack As String = Nothing

ActivityId ActivityId

Edit

x-ms-activity-id The value that is used to pass activityID in REST API between services

public const string ActivityId = nullPublic Const ActivityId As String = Nothing

ApiVersion ApiVersion

Edit

api-version Specifies the version of the protocol used to make this request.

public const string ApiVersion = nullPublic Const ApiVersion As String = Nothing

ClientAppId ClientAppId

Edit

x-ms-client-app-id Set to the app Id of the client JWT making the request.

public const string ClientAppId = nullPublic Const ClientAppId As String = Nothing

ClientAudience ClientAudience

Edit

x-ms-client-audience Set to the tenant ID of the client JWT making the request.

public const string ClientAudience = nullPublic Const ClientAudience As String = Nothing

ClientIpAddress ClientIpAddress

Edit

x-ms-client-ip-address Set to the client IP address used in the request; this is required since the resource provider will not have access to the client IP.

public const string ClientIpAddress = nullPublic Const ClientIpAddress As String = Nothing

ClientIssuer ClientIssuer

Edit

x-ms-client-issuer Set to the issuer of the client JWT making the request.

public const string ClientIssuer = nullPublic Const ClientIssuer As String = Nothing

ClientObjectId ClientObjectId

Edit

x-ms-client-object-id Set to the object Id of the client JWT making the request.

public const string ClientObjectId = nullPublic Const ClientObjectId As String = Nothing

ClientRequestId ClientRequestId

Edit

x-ms-client-request-id Caller-specified request ID, in the form of a GUID with no decoration such as curly braces (e.g. client-request-id: 9C4D50EE-2D56-4CD3-8152-34347DC9F2B0). A caller-defined value that identifies the given request. If specified, this will be included in response information as a way to map the request. If the caller provides this header – the resource provider must log this with their traces to facilitate tracing a single request.

public const string ClientRequestId = nullPublic Const ClientRequestId As String = Nothing

ClientTenantId ClientTenantId

Edit

x-ms-client-tenant-id Set to the tenant ID of the client JWT making the request.

public const string ClientTenantId = nullPublic Const ClientTenantId As String = Nothing

CorrelationId CorrelationId

Edit

Used in message responses and feedback Specifies the tracing correlation Id for the request; the resource provider must log this so that end-to-end requests can be correlated across Azure. 

public const string CorrelationId = nullPublic Const CorrelationId As String = Nothing

DeliveryCount DeliveryCount

Edit

Number of times the message has been previously delivered

public const string DeliveryCount = nullPublic Const DeliveryCount As String = Nothing

EnqueuedTime EnqueuedTime

Edit

Time when the Message was received by the server

public const string EnqueuedTime = nullPublic Const EnqueuedTime As String = Nothing

ExpiryTime ExpiryTime

Edit

[Optional] The time when this message is considered expired

public const string ExpiryTime = nullPublic Const ExpiryTime As String = Nothing

HttpAppPropertyPrefix HttpAppPropertyPrefix

Edit

Prefix for all Application property Http Headers

public const string HttpAppPropertyPrefix = nullPublic Const HttpAppPropertyPrefix As String = Nothing

HttpDevice HttpDevice

Edit 
public const string HttpDevice = nullPublic Const HttpDevice As String = Nothing

HttpErrorCodeName HttpErrorCodeName

Edit 
public const string HttpErrorCodeName = nullPublic Const HttpErrorCodeName As String = Nothing

HttpIotHub HttpIotHub

Edit 
public const string HttpIotHub = nullPublic Const HttpIotHub As String = Nothing

HttpIotHubName HttpIotHubName

Edit

Internal HTTP custom headers

public const string HttpIotHubName = nullPublic Const HttpIotHubName As String = Nothing

MessageId MessageId

Edit

[Required for two way requests] Used to correlate two-way communication. Format: A case-sensitive string ( up to 128 char long) of ASCII 7-bit alphanumeric chars

  • {'-', ':', '/', '\', '.', '+', '%', '_', '#', '*', '?', '!', '(', ')', ',', '=', '@', ';', '$', '''}. Non-alphanumeric characters are from URN RFC.
public const string MessageId = nullPublic Const MessageId As String = Nothing

MessageLockTimeout MessageLockTimeout

Edit

Amount of time in seconds to lock message before abandoning the lock and allowing the message to be retrieved again

public const string MessageLockTimeout = nullPublic Const MessageLockTimeout As String = Nothing

MessageLockToken MessageLockToken

Edit

The lock token of the retrieved message 

public const string MessageLockToken = nullPublic Const MessageLockToken As String = Nothing

MicrosoftAsyncOperationHeaderName MicrosoftAsyncOperationHeaderName

Edit

Azure-AsyncOperation Set to the URL where the result of the long running operation can be checked; to optionally be used in addition to the Location header.

public const string MicrosoftAsyncOperationHeaderName = nullPublic Const MicrosoftAsyncOperationHeaderName As String = Nothing

Operation Operation

Edit

[Optional] Used to specify the role of the message in the communication pattern. Possible values: “d2c”: telemetry message (device to cloud) “c2d”: notification “d2creq”: inquiry request “d2cres”: inquiry response “c2dreq”: command request “c2dres”: command response

public const string Operation = nullPublic Const Operation As String = Nothing

PrincipalName PrincipalName

Edit

x-ms-client-principal-name Set to the principal ID / UPN of the client JWT making the request.

public const string PrincipalName = nullPublic Const PrincipalName As String = Nothing

RequestId RequestId

Edit

x-ms-request-id A unique identifier for the current operation, service generated. All the resource providers must return this value in the response headers to facilitate debugging.

public const string RequestId = nullPublic Const RequestId As String = Nothing

ReturnClientRequestId ReturnClientRequestId

Edit

x-ms-return-client-request-id Optional True or false and indicates if a client-request-id should be provided.

public const string ReturnClientRequestId = nullPublic Const ReturnClientRequestId As String = Nothing

SequenceNumber SequenceNumber

Edit

iothub-sequencenumber A monotonically increasing identifier for each message

public const string SequenceNumber = nullPublic Const SequenceNumber As String = Nothing

To To

Edit

[Required] Destination of the message

public const string To = nullPublic Const To As String = Nothing

UserId UserId

Edit

[Required in feedback messages] Used to specify the origin of messages generated by IOT hub. Possible value: “{hub name}/”

public const string UserId = nullPublic Const UserId As String = Nothing
